title: Thannhausen Citysheet
tagline: Silence is not empty—it's full of patterns.
motto: A place has a pulse. Your job is to notice it.
short_intro: Thannhausen is a calm, hill-and-forest municipality near Weiz—rural in rhythm, strong in local hospitality. It's an ideal 'slow quest' zone: here, the world doesn't shout; it whispers.

sights.description: A historic castle site in the municipality, perfect as a 'lore anchor' for the quest tone.

pois.name: Schlosstaverne
pois.story: Find the courtyard feeling: stand still for 30 seconds and name the quietest detail you notice.
pois.narration: The tavern beside the castle feels like a checkpoint built from food, wood, and old stories.

pois.name: Gasthaus Hafner
pois.story: Ask one question: 'What's the house specialty?' Write the answer as a single word.
pois.narration: A real village quest starts when you ask locals what's truly 'the specialty'—and listen.

pois.name: Kernölfenster (24h local product window)
pois.story: Collect one 'local relic': take a mental note of the smell, color, or label—no photo needed.
pois.narration: A tiny window of pumpkin seed oil can feel like a loot chest: small, local, and strangely powerful.

pois.name: Movement Vibe (community pulse anchor)
pois.reference: Municipality's movement initiative/recognition in 2025 (use as lore flavor)
pois.story: Do a 60-second 'movement check': walk 30 steps slower than usual and notice what changes.
pois.narration: This place treats movement like a shared ritual—the village itself becomes your party.

author: goAuD - WASD Travel
